name: Trip.com Group Limited
description: Trip.com Group Limited is a leading online travel services company that operates an extensive range of travel services and products across its various platforms. Founded in 1999, Trip.com has grown from a domestic travel agency in China to a global online travel leader, providing comprehensive travel solutions for millions of customers worldwide. The company offers hotel bookings, flight reservations, vacation packages, car rentals, and travel insurance, among other services. With a user-friendly interface and innovative technology, Trip.com aims to simplify the travel experience for its users. The company also provides a unique travel experience by leveraging its proprietary technology and global partnerships, allowing travelers to explore destinations, manage bookings, and access travel-related services seamlessly. Trip.com is committed to enhancing customer satisfaction through personalized service and a wide range of options, catering to both leisure and business travelers. The company’s mission is to help people experience the world, one trip at a time, making travel more accessible and enjoyable.

seo.meta_title: Trip.com Group Limited | Leading Online Travel Services
seo.meta_description: Explore Trip.com Group Limited, a global leader in online travel services. Discover a wide range of travel solutions including hotel bookings, flights, and vacation packages.

faq.question: What services does Trip.com offer?
faq.answer: Trip.com offers hotel bookings, flight reservations, vacation packages, car rentals, and travel insurance.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Trip.com?
faq.answer: Jane Sun is the CEO of Trip.com Group Limited.

faq.question: Where is Trip.com headquartered?
faq.answer: Trip.com is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
